events.title: Digimon Ghost Game
events.description: Rumors about "Hologram Ghosts" spread on social media; Hiro Amanokawa activates a device and encounters a Digimon called Gammamon.

events.title: Linkin Park
events.description: Meteora (20th Anniversary Edition) is the 20th anniversary celebratory release of Linkin Park's second album Meteora. It was released on March 24, 2023 through Warner Records

events.title: Wednesday
events.description: While attending Nevermore Academy, Wednesday Addams attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents 25 years ago.

events.title: A dummy event
events.description: Join this amazing event and connect with fellow developers.
